contest-event.event-date: Nov. 9, 1985 D National Mineworkers (Second Section) National Mineworkers (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-second-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Second Prometheus Unbound Winter Gardens (Empress Ballroom), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK Prizes 1st £500, 2nd £425, 3rd £350, 4th £275, 5th £200, 6th £125. 10 bands competed. 23 rd annual contest Dec. 23, 2011, 3:32 p.m. June 14, 2020, 11:20 a.m. 1 Barnsley Brass Steve Sykes 2 Longannet Colliery (Cowdenbeath) Murray Slater 3 Coedely E. J. Clark 4 Kippax Band Tony Whitaker 5 Craghead Colliery Band Ken Wheatley 6 Blidworth Welfare Band R. J. Birch Unknown Result Newbridge Celynen Band Colin Radford Unknown Result Strata Brass Barry Thompson Unknown Result Newstead Brass B. G. Wilkinson Unknown Result Ferryhill Town Barry Holden
